mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.coupon_id AS "coupon.id", a.code AS "code", a.is_used AS "isUsed", a.used_date AS "usedDate", a.member_id AS "memMember.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "coupon.name", m.name AS "memMember.username"
LEFT JOIN coupon b ON b.id = a.coupon_id LEFT JOIN mem_member m ON m.id = a.member_id
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM coupon_code a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.coupon_id = #{id} AND a.is_used = 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_code( id, coupon_id, code, is_used, used_date, member_id, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{coupon.id}, #{code}, #{isUsed}, #{usedDate}, #{memMember.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon_code SET coupon_id = #{coupon.id}, code = #{code}, is_used = #{isUsed}, used_date = #{usedDate}, member_id = #{memMember.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
